sources.name: sUserData
sources.description: This is the description sections.  This is a parquet data source.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		create_date as timestamp,
		user_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		FullName as string,
		login_id as string,
		email as string,
		active as integer,
		update_date as timestamp,
		billable as integer,
		mscrm_system_user_id as integer,
		mscrm_cat_consultant_id as integer,
		mscrm_contact_id as integer,
		contractor_rate as integer,
		contractor_rate_type as integer,
		user_guid as integer,
		bamboo_id as double,
		practice as string,
		current_manager as integer,
		xCustom as string,
		joblevel_rate as integer,
		mobile_phone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sUserData
SelectUserData aggregate(groupBy(billable,
		active,
		user_id),
	create_date = max(create_date),
		first_name = max(first_name),
		last_name = max(last_name),
		FullName = max(FullName),
		login_id = max(login_id),
		email = max(email),
		bamboo_id = max(bamboo_id),
		practice = max(practice),
		current_manager = max(current_manager),
		joblevel_rate = max(joblevel_rate),
		mobile_phone = max(mobile_phone),
		xCustom = max(xCustom)) ~> AggrUserData
AggrUserData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsert
sUserData derive(first_name = trim(first_name)) ~> derivedfirstname
derivedfirstname select(mapColumn(
		create_date,
		user_id,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		FullName,
		login_id,
		email,
		active,
		update_date,
		billable,
		mscrm_system_user_id,
		mscrm_cat_consultant_id,
		mscrm_contact_id,
		contractor_rate,
		contractor_rate_type,
		user_guid,
		bamboo_id,
		practice,
		current_manager,
		xCustom,
		joblevel_rate,
		mobile_phone
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectUserData
Upsert sink(input(
		LFBI_ID as integer,
		LFBI_LoadTime as timestamp,
		LFBI_Start as timestamp,
		LFBI_End as timestamp,
		LFBI_Current as boolean,
		billable as boolean,
		active as boolean,
		create_date as timestamp,
		user_id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		FullName as string,
		login_id as string,
		email as string,
		bamboo_id as integer,
		practice as string,
		current_manager as integer,
		joblevel_rate as decimal(19,4),
		Mobile_Phone as string,
		OnPTO as boolean,
		xCustom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Mobile_Phone'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		LFBI_LoadTime = create_date,
		LFBI_Current = create_date,
		LFBI_Start = create_date,
		LFBI_End = create_date,
		billable,
		active,
		create_date,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		FullName,
		login_id,
		email,
		bamboo_id,
		practice,
		current_manager,
		joblevel_rate,
		Mobile_Phone = mobile_phone,
		xCustom
	)) ~> dPersonnel

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcTraffic
srcTraffic sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tgtTraffic

source(output(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as double,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> UserData
UserData derive(registration_dttm = toDate(toString(registration_dttm))) ~> RegistrationDT
RegistrationDT aggregate(groupBy(ip_address),
	registration_dttm = max(registration_dttm),
		id = max(id),
		first_name = max(first_name),
		last_name = max(last_name),
		email = max(email),
		gender = max(gender),
		cc = max(cc),
		country = max(country),
		birthdate = max(birthdate),
		salary = max(salary),
		title = max(title),
		comments = max(comments)) ~> AggregateUser
AggregateUser alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsert
Upsert sink(input(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as double,
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		registration_dttm,
		id,
		first_name,
		last_name,
		email,
		gender,
		ip_address,
		cc,
		country,
		birthdate,
		salary,
		title,
		comments
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserDataSink

properties.description: Add a Union ALL to pickup unknown record

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
Date_OF_Birth as create_date, 
[User_Name] as [user_id], 
[First_Name] as first_name, 
[LastName] as last_name, 
[First_Name] + ',' + [LastName] as FullName, 
[User_Name] as login_id, 
[EMail] as email, 
1 as active, 
getdate() as update_date, 
1 as billable, 
0 as mscrm_system_user_id, 
0 as mscrm_cat_consultant_id, 
0 as mscrm_contact_id, 
165 as contractor_rate, 
1 as contractor_rate_type, 
1234 as user_guid, 
Weight_in_Kgs as bamboo_id, 
'Data' as practice, 
1 as current_manager, 
'0' as xCustom,
3 as joblevel_rate, 
Phone_No as mobile_phone
from dbo.dboEmpSample
